column4: man devede is taking forever to convert the video file to dvd
I have a Phenom X4 3.0ghz deneb processor, 8gb DDR2 ram
depends on hardware, but yeah, it took me 1.5hrs to make a 7gbs dvd to m4v on a core2 duo 3gbs ddr2 ram, it took me 40mins to simply rip it as .vobs
rip it to .vob on a 1.6ghz single core machine with 512mbs ram
